Name: Monster Capture King
About the game: A monster catcher game in black and white! You play as King, who becomes obsessed with capturing monsters after recruiting his first companion known as 'Doggy'. You can capture a wide range of unique monsters and battle them five at once! To prove yourself as a pro monster capturer, it is your objective to defeat all of the arena masters on the continent so you can claim yourself as the Monster Capture King! Beautiful black and white graphics, specially drawn. Over 30 enemies, most of them tamable! Each with their own strengths and weaknesses! Eight arenas to compete in with some tough boss battles. Try combining different monsters to create the most powerful team! Battle with other trainers to level up.
